body.name: BOHON LED Desk Lamp with USB Charging Port 3 Color Modes Dimmable Reading Light Intelligent Induction Auto Dimming Task Lamp Flexible Gooseneck Table Lamp for Bedside Office, AC Adapter Include
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 39 mins
features: 👑【Upgraded Intelligent Eye-Caring Desk Lamp】With 56 top SMD2835 LED beads for emitting a 3000K-5500K soft, stable and non-flickering light, which is friendly to your eyes, perfect for reading, work, or rest. Adopting the most advanced LED technology, can save up to 90% energy compared to traditional ones. 10-watt LED lights provide a maximum of 900 lumens. Also, the LEDs will last about 20,000 hours, which means that you don't need to spend more money or energy on maintenance.

👑【Intelligent Induction Auto Dimming Mode & Memory Function】The desk lamp can sense ambient light and automatically adjust the appropriate brightness. Automatically brighten the dim lighting environment to avoid fatigue caused by dim lighting. The bright light environment is automatically dimmed to avoid discomfort caused by too strong light. The lamp’s memory function retains preset settings and reboots accordingly.

👑【3 Color Modes & Rotary Knob Dimming】Table lamp is controlled by knob switch and key switch. ①[Power on and off] press the rotary knob button, ②[Change color mode] Press the button on the right to adjust the color: Natural light - White light - Warm light. ③ [Adjust the brightness] Turn the rotary knob to adjust the brightness. You can adjust the brightness of any color modes.

👑【Gentle Light & Convenient USB Charging Port】Shines a flicker-free light that brightens your space without harming your eyes; ideal for reading, working or studying. Designed with 1 USB charging port on the lamp base, convenient to charge your mobile phones, tablets, kindles or other electric devices. The USB port can be used whether the lamp is on or off.

👑【High Quality Metal Material & Anti-slip Design】Featured with heavy-duty rugged metal lamp shade and base, durable and aesthetic. Super sturdy metal construction ensures its reliability. Anti-slip pad is firmly attached to the surface of the bottom. Durable flexible gooseneck allows you to adjust your desk lamp with ease and to direct the light wherever you want. 5V, 2A ADAPTER INCLUDED(Worth $ 10)
body.description: Ideal Flicker-Free Light Every pair of lovely eyes deserves serious care. A contemporary take on a lighting classic. Designed to emit a soft, stable, non-flickering wash of light that’s friendly on your eyes, helping you avoid eye fatigue caused by flickering light and harsh glare. What You Get？ 1 x LED Desk lamp1 x USB Cable1 x UL Certified AC Adapter1 x User Manual Kindly Note 1. In the process of installation and use, do not break or bend the light vigorously to avoid deformation or breakage of the lamp. 2. Only Match with the adapter of 5V/ 2A - otherwise will cause damage to the control button and reading light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace a commercial lamp I purchased from my company years ago that finally died. I did not expect to get one near that quality at this price point, but was pleasantly surprised when I took this lamp out of the box. It's a well made lamp with a nice finish. The controls are very simple and intuitive to use too.I had toyed with the idea of getting a clamp on light to prevent it from tipping and making it easier to bend into position, but most of those have the switches on the lamp head or cord which I did not want. That said the base is a lot lighter than my last light, but it is substantial enough that you can maneuver the light into position without the base moving too much. It also has a nice anti-slip protective padding underneath which help protect the surface of the table it's on and keep the base from moving around too.I would have preferred the neck to be a tad longer although it is long enough to direct light over my chair where I sit to read. I also like the three light settings. I use the warmest setting for when I just want a little mood lighting and one of the brighter settings when I am reading or working on something in my chair. The push button switch/dial knob makes it very easy to turn on and off and adjust the brightness - even with my big hands. I did not really care about the USB port but it's a nice feature to have. There is also an ambient light sensing feature I did not need or use yet, but it might be good for some people.All and all I am very happy with this light. It's not the quality of the $200 light I had previously, but it is easily worth the money I paid so I am very happy with the purchase and can recommend this lamp without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my craft and art needs
reviews.reviewText: After searching on and off for the last few years for lamps for my craft and art desk, I stumbled upon these. The price was right and so I ordered two of them. They are perfect! The provide enough light, are versatile with the brightness and are attractive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good light with several features.
reviews.reviewText: This desk light works as described.it has a solid base, a good long and flexible neck and the adjustments for brightness work nicely. This worked well and a would purchase again of needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice lamp. The charger...? Well... lol
reviews.reviewText: Ok, the lamp part is nice: color choice is pleasant, amount of light is good, dimmer is fine, gooseneck is pretty adjustable, the base is solid and well padded to prevent rattles. All good as a lamp. The USB charger pass through? Not so great. When you plug in a phone to charge, the light visibly dims. My phone also said it was going to take over 3 hours to go from 68% charge to full. Ha! Regular charger would do that in a few minutes. So, if you want a good cost more than adequate desk lamp, this is a good deal. But don't think you're getting a decent charger rolled in too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy base, bright yet adjustable light - versatile!
reviews.reviewText: I have needed a desk lamp for the longest time. The last one I had was super old school with a clamp and adjustable neck. I really liked that yet wanted something more sophisticated for my home office desk. Often at the home office, the overhead light is not enough or too little so I needed something closer to my desk workspace. This desk lamp is the perfect size and offers more options than I need for now but happy to have them in case my needs or preferences change. Also, I plugged my FitBit charger into the USB port which opened up one of the ones on my laptop for other uses "on the fly". I recommend this lamp. Can't say enough good things about it. Jamie

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little reading lamp!
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I wanted for a small table by my chair in the living room. I needed a small lamp that I could maneuver when I wanted to read. It is perfect! It is not too big for my table and the moveable arm points right at my book when I want to read. The lighting options are great! It provides nice ambient lighting when not reading and the other two options are excellent and bright enough to read by!Great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute! Perfect
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is perfect for my desk. I like the options for lighting and it auto adjusts as well. Best little buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than it looks.
reviews.reviewText: This looks like it was made for dwarves, but it works fine. Plenty bright and heavy enough so it doesn't tip over. Please make one that can be charged from my USB port, instead of using a comically short 4 foot electric cord . . .

No USB Wall Connector - Wanted to use it for a night light to clap to the bedside table, but it doesn't come with a USB Wall Connector. Aside from that, it's awesome. I can angle the light so it is out of my eyes, but brightens the page so i can easily read. I have dropped it many times and it still works.
Love it! it clips to my head board and has a endless light combination from warm brown lite to bright sunlight and at any intensity you might want it! And of course it''s adjustable
This would be okay if on the right table or desk but for me it doesn’t work. Had to send it back.
Muy buen producto me encantó, barato y de muy buena calidad.
